Greater Lamont Chamber of Commerce - Lamont, CA
October 30, 2019 at 2:02 PM ·

***HARVEST FESTIVAL CANCELLED***

We are very sad to announce that we will be cancelling tonight's Harvest Festival.

Unfortunately the time that the forecasters are predicting the winds will end has been pushed back several times and they are now saying it won't end before the festival is scheduled to begin. We want to make sure that all of our children, families, and partners are safe, and with the very real threat of Valley Fever, asthma, and allergies, it just isn't safe to be outside tonight.

I know this is a tremendous inconvenience for partners who have been preparing for this, and we apologize greatly for that. Thank you to everyone who helped make this event possible, and we hope we can count on your support again on October 30th, 2020 at our next festival.

With many regrets,
The Greater Lamont Chamber of Commerce Board of Directors
